segments.text: Good afternoon . I am Mr . Brown , the Import manager of Atlantic Industries Ltd , Sidney , Australia . This is my card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good afternoon , Mr . Brown . My name is Mrs . Anderson , manager of the sales department .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice to see you , Mrs . Anderson .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nice to see you too , Mr . Brown . Won ’ t you sit down ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you like , tea or coffee ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ d prefer coffee if you don ’ t mind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it your first trip to the Fair , Mr . Brown ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it ’ s the fourth time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Is there anything you find changed about the Fair ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , a great deal . The business scope has been broadened , and there are more visitors than ever before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really , Mr . Brown ? Did you find anything interesting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . Quite a bit . But we are especially interested in your products .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are glad to hear that . What items are you particularly interested in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Women ’ s dresses . They are fashionable and suit Australian women well , too . If they are of high quality and the prices are reasonable , we ’ ll purchase large quantities of them . Will you please quote us a price ?
segments.speaker: S1
